Topic.Title: Part 2 of The Eye Of The Storm is now available.

Posts.EditableText:
Hey All.

The eye of the storm gamebook is back online and Part 2 is ready to play. There is also a better Description.

*[url=http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/9284kr2aw02uy5m4jtijcw/the-eye-of-the-storm:2yl5cy46]The Eye Of The Storm Series.[/url:2yl5cy46] (Information and updates) Link leads to the gamebook.
- Issues fixed but if you find any just tell me, thanks. 
- Some added content available. 
- New battle layout: In Testing. This requires reviews or comments to become better.
- Part 2: Now Available. 
- In memory of Monty Oum, the recently deceased creator of RWBY, I have replaced the cover picture with his most memorable sayings. 

This is a fan made adventure based on the Roosterteeth original series RWBY. Join the team and fight an unknown enemy in a quest to discover the truth behind the mysterious storm. You will fight monsters and make decisions that affect the fate of everyone around you. 

Thank you and enjoy.*

If you would like to review or comment your thoughts, I would really appreciate it.
Thanks for your time and I hope you enjoy Part 2 and the added content with it.
